text: Weil looking out a window in 1917 Hermann Wilhelm Weil (1876 – July 6, 1949), was a baritone singer at the Metropolitan Opera. ==Biography== He was born in 1876. He sang with the Metropolitan Opera starting in 1911. He drowned on July 6, 1949 in Blue Mountain Lake, New York after falling from an outboard motorboat. ==References== ==External links== * Category:American operatic baritones Category:1876 births Category:1949 deaths
title: Hermann Wilhelm Weil
